thread.title: The Michael Cohen Case Explained

author: Jacob Gershman
title: The Michael Cohen Case Explained
text:
Last week, federal agents raided the law office, home and hotel room of President Donald Trump’s attorney, Michael Cohen. Prosecutors obtained the search warrant after a federal magistrate judge found probable cause to believe Mr. Cohen’s materials contained criminal evidence.

Federal agents walked away with hard drives, electronic devices and as many as 10 boxes of physical documents. But it could take months or longer for the team investigating Mr. Cohen to assess what they have seized because Mr. Cohen and Mr. Trump both...
